ygData.msgSnippet: Stranato was confused now, this bot seemed to die sad. First he wanted to die, he should have been happy, but he seemed so sad to die, the knife had no affect,

Stranato was confused now, this bot seemed to die sad. First he wanted to d=
ie, he should have been happy, but he seemed so sad to die, the knife had n=
o affect, he froze to death. Stranato sighed, this was the part of his job =
he hated. Stranato picked up Drazom's body and carried it back to the Radic=
on's wrecked ship, which served as their base. Stranato set Drazom's body o=
n a table.

"Any way we can bring him back? We can reprogram him to serve u=
s." Stranato said.

"I don't think so, his spark looks to be extinguished, =
sorry poor fellow, we couldn't save ya." Train Wreck said.

"I shouldn't ha=
ve stabbed him." Stranato said.

"It wasn't you who killed him, he froze to=
 death, just sorry he didn't make it." Train Wreck said.

"No, you don't un=
derstand, I tried to kill him, I'm no better than the cold! I don't underst=
and why I did something like that, maybe it was the cold." Stranato said. H=
e sighed.

"Maybe I'm just a son of a--"

"No, you are acting stupid now! Y=
our murderer curcuits blocked out your intelligence circuits and your logic=
 circuits." Train Wreck said, interupting Stranato.

"I hope your right." S=
tranato said. Train Wreck looked at the body.

"We could always put a new s=
park in his body" Train Wreck said. Stranato sighed and sat in the corner.
=

"We could have used him, and instead we let him die and didn't save him, a=
nd I tried to kill him myself." Stranato said.

OCC: Orchid, the Radicons c=
ould put a new spark from their spark collection (From deathmatches!) into =
Drazom's body if you want to have a new character with Drazoms body, Orchid=
. Orchid, I could have them change the body and you can bring in a new char=
acter without having him or her look like Drazom at all, your choice, you c=
an just have them get rid of his body even, just pick something, please...
=
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egrou=
ps.com 
  Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 8:37 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wa=
rs


  *The knife hit Drazom's back. He didn't scream or anything. It was a=
lready snowing which made him even colder. Mech fluid begins pouring out of=
 his back* Drazom:............ *Drazom's head hits the ground. It wasn't re=
ally the knife. It was coldness. Drazom's spark fades out and he lies there=
......and mutters one word..* Drazom:....Mantella....... *Drazom's optics f=
licker and fade out* *He lived to love....he lived to die.....That was a qu=
eston that would never be answered*





  (OOC: Please Drazom on the Decea=
sed bots page. as that he died from the lack of emch fluid and because of h=
ow cold it was)
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To=
: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 6:54 PM
    Subject=
: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    The Radicons had walked off and left Drazom, but=
 now they were walking back and they seen him again. Airbomber laughed.

  =
  "There's the guy I saved, I wonder why he wants to die?" Airbomber asked.=


    "I don't know, but I will oblige his needs!" Stranato said. Stranato =
walked up behind Drazom slowly. Stranato pulled out a knife, something he h=
ad stolen from the People's Base, and plunged it down, the knife screaming =
toward Drazom's back.

    Stronghold and Blender took a sip of their beer.=


    "Why does that guy want to die, though?" Arrow asked.

    "Some bots=
 are crazy." Train Wreck said, the 5 Radicons watching Stranato...
      --=
--- Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@e=
groups.com 
      Sent: Wednesday, June 28, 2000 7:01 PM
      Subject: Re:=
 Neo Beast Wars


      *Drazom slowly turns his head and looks at The Radi=
cons* Drazom:....no......I must...die for.....my stupidity...of....messing =
up with......Mantella..... *Drazom's optics widen as he remembers something=
* Drazom:...hey....I'm a Pred.....I AM!.....kill me........*Drazom pulls hi=
sself up by a tree limb and mech fluid pours out of his side and he falls b=
ack to the ground shivering from how cold it is getting from the lack of me=
ch fluid*
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
    =
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Tuesday, June 27, 2000 10:59 PM
 =
       Subject: Neo Beast Wars


        Train Wreck walked away from the b=
attle, Plintissa and Stronghold run away. Stranato, not seeing any point in=
 continuing the battle, ran off with them. Scamrock followed with a grunt f=
rom being outnumbered. Artist laughed and ran after them as well.

        =
"Know what my names gonna be now? I'm going to be Blender!" Scamrock said.
=

        "Who cares about you?" Stranato asked. Stronghold reached out to g=
rab Stranato but he cartwheeled out of the way.

        "We left that idio=
t Arrow in your CR Chamber, Plintissa." Stronghold said.

        "WHAT!?" =
Stranato yelled.

        "It's my base, and Arrow is welcome to be repaire=
d there and so are the other former Radicons!" Plintissa yelled.

        T=
he Radicons nodded and walked on, Stranato grumbled out something that none=
 of them, could understand. Airbomber seen them and waved to them. The Peop=
le's Base's secret passageway was in the nearby swamp.

        "Get ready!=
" Train Wreck said to Airbomber.

        "What about this guy?" Airbomber =
asked.

        "Never mind him." Train Wreck said. Airbomber drug Drazom o=
ut of the water and ushered him to come along while he walked with his comr=
ades.

        Dracona was getting furious, and so was Gangon.

        "So=
rry Gangon, I did all I could, maybe BrightBlade will still show up anyway.=
" Dracona said. Gangon waited while Dracona flew away.

        "Hey! Wait!=
 You forgot to untie meeeee!" Gangon screamed.

        Dracona didn't hear=
 and landed next to the People's Group members. The Radicons, Plintissa, Dr=
acona, and Artist all entered the Poeple's base through the secret passage =
way, the computer reconizing them as friends. Train Wreck and Airbomber ste=
pped into a door.

        "Hey, Stranato, look at this! It's amazing!" Tra=
in Wreck called out. Arrow steps out of the CR Chamber all healed up.

    =
    "Yeah, it's got lots of beer and cigars in here, too! and it's big enou=
gh to put a table in to play cards! How come we never noticed this room bef=
ore?" Airbomber said. Stranato walked into the room. Stronghold and Blender=
 followed.

        "Wait up guys!" Arrow called out, running into the room=
. Plintissa sealed the door magnetically upon order from Train Wreck, the R=
adicons were locked inside the room to sort out their problems. There was a=
lot of banging, but it eventually stopped. Alot of name calling, too. Plint=
issa laughed and sat down at a table to play cards with Dracona.

        "=
Oh, man! Not even a drop of beer in here! We'll dehydrate drinking water!" =
Stronghold said.

        "What are we going to do? Nothing to smoke!" Blen=
der said.

        "I have more needs than all of you idiots put together! =
I'm getting fat and need to exercise!" Stranato yelled.

        "How come =
we can't all get along! I don't like it in here neither!" Arrow said. Stran=
ato looked at him like he was going to kill him. Arrow cowered in the corne=
r.

        "You see? That's why you fail, Arrow, you don't stand up agains=
t Stranato and his stupid rules! This was our idea!" Train Wreck yelled.

 =
       "Yeah, and nobody is getting out of here until we are all friends ag=
ain." Airbomber said.

        Stranato sighed in disapointment. Arrow stoo=
d up again, and started pacing the room. Stronghold and Blender started to =
look in cracks in the wall for something to drink, despite plenty of water =
in this room. Train Wreck was discussing something with Arrow and Airbomber=
, and Stronghold and Blender joined them before long.

        "Say, you gu=
ys, it's really lonely sitting here with nothing to do, and--"

        "Sh=
ut up and get your ass over here! Of course you can join us!" Arrow said, c=
utting off Stranato. Stranato walks over and sits with them. Stronghold pul=
ls out a pack of playing cards.

        Plintissa and Dracona smile to eac=
h other and walk up and out of the secret passgeway, taking a walk across a=
 field...
